original_title: Police sergeant arrested for alleged sexual assault at canteen
original_body_lines: Bingiriya, May 22 (Daily Mirror) - A police sergeant stationed at the Bingiriya Police has been arrested for allegedly sexually assaulting a woman working in the police canteen.
The incident involves a fifty-year-old woman who operates the canteen within the Bingiriya police station premises.
Police said the suspect was arrested following an investigation after a petition was submitted to the Inspector General of Police regarding the matter.
